author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Travelcenters Of America Llc Announces Q4 Loss Per Share $0.52
text:
Feb 28 (Reuters) - Travelcenters Of America Llc:
* ANNOUNCES FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* Q4 LOSS PER SHARE $0.52 * QTRLY TOTAL REVENUES $1.58 BILLION VERSUS $1.41 BILLION * QTRLY FUEL SALES VOLUME DECREASED BY 5.6 MILLION GALLONS, OR 1.0 PCT‍​
* QTRLY SAME SITE FUEL SALES VOLUME DECREASED BY 9.2 MILLION GALLONS, OR 1.8 PERCENT
* TRAVELCENTERS OF AMERICA - COST REDUCTION INITIATIVES TA BEGAN IN FIRST HALF OF 2017 RESULTED IN ABOUT $4.6 MILLION OF SAVINGS IN 2017 Q4
* EXPECT SOME INCREMENTAL SAVINGS IN 2018 FROM 2017 LEVELS, PRIMARILY IN Q1 AND Q2 OF 2018 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Brief@thomsonreuters.com)
